ThingDef.label: empress thumper
ThingDef.description: A vibration-producing thumper device. When activated, it starts emitting powerful thump pulses, which will attract an insectoid empress to attack with its escorts. If you can defeat her, you can collect a special pherocore from her corpse. The thumps destabilise the thumper, so this building can only be used once.
